card.note: Our lives are fuller, more colorful, and so much more fun with you beside us!
card.author: Lisa Gary and the Girls

card.note: So very grateful for our friendship. It has blossomed over this past decade and I know it will continue on through our families. Thank you for always being there for us!
card.author: Gary Lisa and the girls

card.note: I love how you know just what I need, feel or hope for, even before I do. You truly are my fairy godmother! Xo
card.author: Lisa Charleston

card.note: because you possess this uncanny ability to give and continue giving without ever asking for anything in return.you have created the format for how a grandmother should show unconditional LOVE.
card.author: a secret admirerer

card.note: We Love You Because.../RYou are the best person to be at the beach with and shop with and talk to I LOVE YOU MOM MOM DIANE
card.author: Xoxo Mikaila Thompson

card.note: We love you because your unconditional love is ever-present, and are grateful that you are our mom.
card.author: Marc & David

card.note: I love you because you are a great grandmother to me and you are always there for me when I feel down and you always have a way to cheer me up.
card.author: Andrew.B

card.note: I love you because you support me in all on my endeavors, you're kind and loving natured, you're thoughtful and caring, and because you never just think about your self. You are one of the best grandmothers a person could ever wish for.
card.author: Daniel

card.note: Your loyalty, generosity, and unconditional love + support for you grandchildren.
card.author: Alex

card.note: I love you because you always put your family first
card.author: Matt

card.note: Mom Mom,/RWe love your thoughtful dedication to your family and the way you make everyone feel special with your kind and caring words. You have a positive influence on all of us to be the best that we can be!!/R
card.author: Bryna and Fred

card.note: Dear One/RDo not be afraid to sparkle and shine.
card.author: Love you bunches!

card.note: All you need is love....and a tiara./R/RAnd maybe a cookie.
A bird siting on a tree is never afraid of the branch breaking because her trust is not on the branch but on it's own wings. Always believe in yourself.
card.author: xoxoxoxo

card.note: There are people in your life whom you unknowingly inspire simply be being you.
card.author: Adore you!

card.note: There is a Wonder Woman inside each of us.
card.author: A secret admirer

card.note: He said, "There are only two days in the year that nothing can be done. One is called yesterday and the other is called tomorrow, so today is the right day to love, believe, do and mostly live."
card.author: -Dalai Lama

card.note: You alone are enough. You have nothing to prove to anybody.
card.author: -Maya Angelou

card.note: Nothing can dim the light which shines from within.
card.author: Maya Angelou

card.note: "There is a sacredness in tears. They are not the mark of weakness, but of power. They speak more eloquently than ten thousand tongues. They are messengers of overwhelming grief...and unspeakable love."
card.author: Washington Irving

card.note: No beauty shines brighter than that of a good heart
card.author: Yours is the BEST heart too!

card.note: There are people in your life whom you unknowingly inspire simply by being you.
card.author: Truth!

card.note: Look forward with hope, not backwards with regret.
card.author: xo

card.note: Family isn't always blood. It's the people in your life who want you in theirs; the ones who accept yo for who yo are. The ones who would do anything to see you smile & who LOVE YOU no matter what.
card.author: Truth!

card.note: "Art has the role in education of helping children become like themselves instead of more like everyone else." Sydney Clemens./RTHANK YOU for inspiring ART in our lives!
card.author: Adore you!

card.note: "Be your authentic, awesome, amazing self! The world needs YOU and your beautiful light. Shine bright, Dear One"
card.author: xo

card.note: Worrying does not empty tomorrow of its troubles. It empties today of its strength.
card.author: Truth!

card.note: She was afraid. She did it anyway, and it felt SO GOOD!!
card.author: xo

card.note: A Mother's LOVE for her child is like noting else in the world. It knows no law, no pity, it dares all things, and crushes down remorselessly all that that stand in its path.
card.author: Agatha Christie

card.note: There is nothing more beautiful than believing in youserlf. Thank you for helping us to believe in ourselves~
card.author: Mikaila and Lily

card.note: You are never as alone as you feel at times. We carry with us the love of those that can't be with us, the hope of what can be and the connection to something bigger than we can imagine.
card.author: xoxoxoxo

card.note: I hope you still feel small when you stand beside the ocean whenever one door closes I hope one more opens, and promise me that you'll give faith a fighting chance. When you get the choice to sit it our or dance, I HOPE YOU DANCE
card.author: Love you bunches!

card.note: Happiness starts with you - not your relationships, not your job, not your money, but with you.
card.author: Truth!

card.note: I have chosen to be HAPPY because it is good for my health.
card.author: Voltaire

card.note: If your compassion does not include yourself, it is incomplete
card.author: Buddha

card.note: There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind.
card.author: C. S. Lewis

card.note: Eventually all things fall into place. Until then, laugh at the confusion, live for the moments and know everything happens for a reason.
card.author: Albert Schweitzer

card.note: Whenever I question my purpose in life, your presence reminds me. I am important and loved. Always.
card.author: Lisa

card.note: Gary and I will always remember our special celebration at the 1997 Berman/Charleston Annual Pool Party - just a month before our wedding. Great time, with the best friends, food and laughter.
card.author: Lisa and Gary

card.note: I'm so glad you are in our lives. We are each better for knowing you.
card.author: Adore you MOM MOM!!

card.note: My mom always saved the very BEST of her cookie batches for the Bermans. As an adult, I certainly understand why. XOXO
card.author: Lisa and Gary

card.note: There is no better call to receive than the "I have been thinking about you" call from YOU!!
card.author: xoxoxoxo
